description.value: Glecaprevir/pibrentasvir should not be used in patients with decompensated cirrhosis (CTP B or C). Glecaprevir/pibrentasvir should not be used in combination with atazanavir or rifampin. Providers should check http://www.hep-druginteractions.org, https://www.hepatitis.va.gov/provider/guidelines/hcv-treatment-considerations.asp, and/or a pharmacist for additional drug interactions or contraindications before starting glecaprevir/pibrentasvir.

title.value: Laboratory Tests
Suggested tests for management of hepatitis C

textEquivalent.value: Complete blood count 1 time (routine)
Hepatic function panel 1 time (routine)
International normalized ratio 1 time (routine)
Basic metabolic panel 1 time (routine)
Glomerular Filtration rate 1 time (routine)

title.value: The following lab is recommended if not performed within the previous 5 years.

textEquivalent.value: HCV genotype 1 time (routine)

title.value: The following labs are recommended if not performed within the previous 10 years.

textEquivalent.value: Hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg) 1 time (routine)
Hepatitis B core antibody (HBcAb) 1 time (routine)
Hepatitis B surface antibody (HBsAb) 1 time (routine)
Hepatitis A antibody (HAVAb) 1 time (routine)

title.value: The following lab is recommended if not performed within the previous 6 months.

elm:operand.name: HCV viral load (quantitative HCV RNA) 1 time (routine)

textEquivalent.value: HCV viral load (quantitative HCV RNA) 1 time (routine)
HIV test 1 time (routine)

elm:value.code: 359796005 |Measurement of both Human immunodeficiency virus 1 antibody and Human immunodeficiency virus 2 antibody (procedure)|

title.value: The following lab is recommended if not performed within the previous 2 weeks.

textEquivalent.value: Qualitative human chorionic gonadotropin 1 time (routine)

title.value: Patient and Caregiver Education
This section should be available to users in gastroenterology settings and for primary care providers who are referring a patient to gastroenterology for management of hepatitis C
